metadata.title: CVE-2024-53101 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs: Fix uninitialized value issue in from_kuid and from_kgidocfs2_setattr() uses attr->ia_mode, attr->ia_uid and attr->ia_gid ina trace point even though ATTR_MODE, ATTR_UID and ATTR_GID aren't set.Initialize all fields of newattrs to avoid uninitialized variables, bychecking if ATTR_MODE, ATTR_UID, ATTR_GID are initialized, otherwise 0.
